title: im cursed. this game physically does not want me to promote
body:
ive been in the silver 4 to silver 3 promoes TEN FUCKING TIMES NOW
every time i go 0/2 on my promos
win 2 games
lose 2 games
win 2 games
lose 2 games

I CAN NEVER WIN IN THE FUCKING SERIES. EVEN WHEN THE TEAM IS AHEAD ALWAYS SEEMS TO END IN A THROW
